::Battera::

She sighed, "I know, it's hard to believe anyon wearing a symbol like 
mine."  she walked towards her room.  "But even I, being a pred and 
all, can give someone a chance."  She lowered her head and walked to 
her room.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex growls. "Allright," he says after a few seconds, "If those 
Predacons try 
> anything, though, peace would be a bit hard."
